org.miller.gwt.client.sound
Class SMSound

java.lang.Object
  org.miller.gwt.client.sound.SMSound

public class SMSound
extends java.lang.Object

SMSound objects are created everytime SoundManager creates a sound. You can retrieve SMSound objects from SoundManager by calling getSoundById and passing in the id that was passed to SoundManager to create the sound. SMSound is used to collect data on the sound loaded up by SoundManager. To use callbacks on a particular sound use SoundOptions callbacks when creating the sound initially.

Author:
JMILLER
